data.title: News Archives – Page 2 of 8
data.text:
Cloud migration for Multotec’s JDE environment: Improving performance and cutting costs

Multotec transitions from ageing Oracle hardware to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).

Medinfar Group’s Journey with JD Edwards and Steltix

Medinfar Group's remarkable journey has been nothing short of inspiring. We had the opportunity to interview Ana Gomes, the company's Chief Financial Officer, who provided us with valuable insights into their operations.

Enhancing Customer Service: GPOT’s Digital Transformation Journey with Steltix

Steltix came highly recommended, and, they have definitely proven themselves as pivotal partner in our search for digital excellence

Customer Success Story: Migration of JDE to OCI

Smart solutions from Steltix ensure seamless migration of JD Edwards to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Pluripharm Group.

Our JD Edwards Journey: Navigating INFOCUS 2023 and European Events

This fall, we embarked on a JD Edwards journey that took us from the heart of the United States to the picturesque landscapes of Europe. Our mission: to delve deep into the world of JD Edwards and the Oracle ecosystem.

Webinar: Elevating efficiency – How e-invoicing is transforming engineering & construction in ANZ, backed by govt incentives

In the dynamic landscape of the engineering and construction industry, complying with regulatory requirements, maintaining security, reducing costs and managing cash flow are crucial for success. Join us on November 15th for this live webinar.

McConnell Dowell selects Steltix for Construction Digital Platform Advisory Services

For over 60 years customers have been coming to McConnell Dowell (MCD) with complex projects that require innovative solutions.

INOAC USA Strengthens JD Edwards Security Through Transparent Logon (Single Sign-On)

The decision to select Steltix TLX10 as the optimal solution for fortifying JD Edwards’ security was underpinned by various compelling factors.

NAPCO Partners with Steltix for a Future-Ready ERP Transformation

Appointed as NAPCO CFO in 2021 with a mandate to modernise the company’s processes and digital systems for increased operational efficiency, Jim Hunter identified a series of challenges, limitations, and potential process enhancements within the back-office systems.
